definitions.definition: A large wasp , of the genus Vespa , having a brown-and-yellow-striped body and the ability to inflict a serious sting.
A person who pesters with petty but ceaseless attacks .

main_definition: A large wasp , of the genus Vespa , having a brown-and-yellow-striped body and the ability to inflict a serious sting.
secondary_definitions: A person who pesters with petty but ceaseless attacks .
